pages.text: $(item)Elemental Oil$() is an essential crafting component in witchcraft. It is generally made out of a type of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/bark)$(item)Bark$() and other components.$(br)To craft oil, throw the piece of bark into a boiling $(l:bewitchment:introduction/cauldron)$(item)Cauldron$() first, then add the other ingredients.$(br)Once it reaches a pleasant, matching color, you can bottle the oil.
